QuestData.Title: The Captain's Logs
QuestData.Description: Now that you've got that thing under control, let's gather up the lumber I was supposed to be collecting. Otherwise these orcs are going to build a catapult out of ME!$B$BFresh lumber should be stockpiled all around the area. Use the shredder to collect all you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Reprogrammed Shredder to collect 6 piles of Azshara Lumber. If you lose your shredder, another can be attacked and reprogrammed.
QuestData.CompletionText: How's the wood processing going? You should see what that thing does to broccoli!
QuestData.RewardText: Great! You've loaded the shredder to capacity. You're getting pretty handy with that thing...
